title: Searching for Silver/Gold ADC EUW for Duo Ranked
body:
Heyho,my Name is Flayday and i am searching for an ADC who would like to play with me Ranked in Preseason and Season 8 ....i got it to silver 3 but fall down to silver 4 at the moment...

Here are some stats about me:

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/de/summoner/euw/BASH+Flayday

if you want to play with me Duo you should be able to:

Lasthit well (65-80/10mins)
Ward on your own too
want to have some fun
want to climb a bit
dont tilt!

i am from Germany but if you are interested i would speack english too ...i got my own teamspeack server so it should be no problem to talk about whatever you want :D

Have a nice Day/Evening and good luck mates! :)

PS:Add me ingame if you are interested with a little info who you are and what you main or what you want from your support to do.

In Game Name :BASH Flayday
